hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash cd /android/exodus thetime=`date +%Y-%m-%d--%H%M%S` # repo manifest -o .repo/snapshots/nightly_$thetime.xml -r cd .repo/snapshots git add nightly_$thetime.xml echo "Nightly push for $thetime " >~/snapshotcommit git commit -F ~/snapshotcommit rm ~/snapshotcommit git push exodus HEAD:EXODUS cd /android/exodus rm -rf out
